body:
One issue is that the add-on will require a specific set of lint configs, to match with mozilla-central policies. Good editors can make this pretty painless. We can easily do this by having common configs in `./.eslintrc` (that, the root of the repo), and an add-on specific version in `./addon/.eslintrc`.

[Here is a tool](https://syslog.ravelin.com/multi-to-mono-repository-c81d004df3ce) that someone else used to convert many repos into a monorepo. It seems helpful if want to preserve git history.
